DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Breast Reconstruction Tissue Flap Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date related to a surgical procedure that involves cutting a section of skin, muscle, fat and blood vessels from the abdomen, tunneling the tissue underneath the skin to its new location, and using it to form a new breast mound.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Pedicle TRAM Flap Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to a type of breast reconstruction in which a section of skin, muscle, fat, and blood vessels from the abdomen is separated from surrounding tissue while retaining its blood supply, and tunneled under the skin to form a new breast mound.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: A type of breast reconstruction in which a section of skin, muscle, fat, and blood vessels from the abdomen is separated from surrounding tissue while retaining its blood supply, and tunneled under the skin to form a new breast mound.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: A type of breast reconstruction in which a section of skin, muscle, fat, and blood vessels from the abdomen is separated from surrounding tissue while retaining its blood supply, and tunneled under the skin to form a new breast mound.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to Alliance for by script Fri Oct 25 15:25:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
